body_content.explanation: in a way that consists of separate parts that, when combined, form a complete whole:
examples: Large computer systems are often built modularly.
These modularly built homes are designed to the same standards as any new home.

body_content.explanation: in a way that consists of several units of teaching that together make a complete course, especially at a university or college in the United Kingdom :
examples: The course is structured modularly, giving students a more flexible choice of options.
